template.value:
<style>
  ._retool-prSelector .button-group-component {
    flex-direction: row !important;
  }
  
  .button-group-component {
    flex-wrap: nowrap !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    overflow-y: scroll;
  }
  
  .button-group-button_html {
    max-width: none;
    width: 98%;
    margin: 3px 5px;
  }
  
  .button-group-button_html.ant-btn-primary {
    background-color: #edf6ff;
    color: #515151;
  }

  .pr-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    padding: 10px 8px;
  }

  .pr-col {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .pr-left {
    max-width: 75%;
    flex-grow: 1;
    flex-shrink: 1;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }

  .pr-right {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    flex-grow: 1;
    width: 100px;
    max-width: 25%;
  }
  
  .pr-name {
    font-size: 1.2em;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    max-width: 100%;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }
  
  .pr-changelog {
    font-weight: 500;
    text-align: right;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  }
  
  .additions {
    color: #28a745;
    margin-right: 2px;
  }
  .deletions {
    color: #cb2431;
  }
  .files-icon {
    margin-bottom: -2px;
  }
  .pr-files {
    opacity: 0.8;
  }
  .avatar {
    width: 14px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    border-radius: 2px;
    margin-right: 2px;
  }
</style>
{{ selectedPR.value.author.login }}

template.labels:
{{ approvedPRs.value.map(pr => `
${pr.title}
${pr.author.login}
+${pr.additions.toLocaleString()} -${pr.deletions.toLocaleString()}
${pr.changedFiles.toLocaleString()} Files
`)}}

{{ assignedToMePRs.value.map(pr => `
${pr.title}
${pr.author.login}
+${pr.additions.toLocaleString()} -${pr.deletions.toLocaleString()}
${pr.changedFiles.toLocaleString()} Files
`)}}

{{ unassignedPRs.value.map(pr => `
${pr.title}
${pr.author.login}
+${pr.additions.toLocaleString()} -${pr.deletions.toLocaleString()}
${pr.changedFiles.toLocaleString()} Files
`)}}

{{ assignedToOthersPRs.value.map(pr => `
${pr.title}
${pr.author.login}
+${pr.additions.toLocaleString()} -${pr.deletions.toLocaleString()}
${pr.changedFiles.toLocaleString()} Files
`)}}
